Class LineParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easydataservices.db2admintool.util.parser.LineParser

  • public class LineParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for parsing a single line of text.

        Return the original line.
        Returns:

      • getRemainingLine

        public java.lang.String getRemainingLine()
        Return the remaining line.
        Returns:
        Remaining line of text (from current position).

      • skipText

        public boolean skipText(java.lang.String regex)
        Skip the specified text. The current position is only advanced if a match is found for the specified text.
        Parameters:
        regex - Regular expression that defines the text to skip.
        Returns:
        true if a matching token was skipped; otherwise false.

      • getTextBefore

        public java.lang.String getTextBefore(java.lang.String regex)
        Get the text before the specified delimiter. The current position is only advanced if a match is found.
        Parameters:
        regex - Regular expression defining the delimiter.
        Returns:
        Matching text if found; otherwise null.

      • isMatch

        public boolean isMatch(java.lang.String regex)
        Check whether text starting at the current position matches the specified regular expression. The current position is not advanced.
        Parameters:
        regex - Regular expression that defines a string match.
        Returns:
        true if the text matches; otherwise false.

      • getMatchEndIndex

        public int getMatchEndIndex()
        Returns offset after the last character matched by the previous isMatch(java.lang.String) call.
        Returns:
        Offset after the last character matched; a 0 is returned if there was no match.
